extrabotany.category.name: Extrabotany
extrabotany.category.desc: Through your deep understanding of Botania, you have discovered a whole new magical world:$(br)here you will find more $(thing)Natural Apparatus$(), $(thing)Mystical Items$(), $(thing)Trinkets$(), and most importantly:$(br2)New $(thing)Gaia bosses$().
advancement.extrabotany:senbon_zakura.de: Read mana 1,000 times with Mana Reader
advancement.extrabotany:panda_do_not_wea: Craft a Master Band of Mana
advancement.extrabotany:overload.desc: Charging Master Band of Mana to Integer Max
advancement.extrabotany:load_of_ring.des: Fully charge the Master Band of Mana
advancement.extrabotany:craft_pedestal.d: Craft a type of Nature Pedestal
advancement.extrabotany:goodtek.desc: Smash items in the Nature Pedestal with a Hammer
advancement.extrabotany:kurukuru.desc: Put all four sides of the Nature Pedestal with an Item Frame that contains a Hammer
advancement.extrabotany:i_see_everything: Link at least 10 mobs in a single use of the camera
advancement.extrabotany:hundred_block_pi: Kill a skeleton from at least 100 meters away using Failnaught
advancement.extrabotany:one_punch.desc: Cast an Aura Fire that deals over 40 damages
advancement.extrabotany:stygian_twins.de: Craft a Photonium Ingot and a Shadowium Ingot
advancement.extrabotany:potato_server.de: Record its name on the Gilded Potato!
advancement.extrabotany:sponge_hammer.de: Who lives in a pineapple under the sea?
advancement.extrabotany:omg_its_miku.des: Equip the full Starry Idol armor set
advancement.extrabotany:seven_samurai.de: Equip the full Shadow Warrior armor set
advancement.extrabotany:goblin_killer.de: Equip the full Goblin Slayer armor set
advancement.extrabotany:cute_dress.desc: Equip the full Pleiades Combat Maid armor set
advancement.extrabotany:corruption.desc: Corrupt the Pleiades Combat Maid Suit
advancement.extrabotany:a_baldrupt.desc: Uh-oh, looks like you let the wind a bit too strong!
advancement.extrabotany:muromi_san.desc: You fished up treasure... with what thing?
advancement.extrabotany:its_only_the_fai: Let the Edelweiss ate a Snow Golem
block.extrabotany.trade_orchid.reference: No longer needs villager discount machine
block.extrabotany.resoncund.reference: I heard the echo of the soul
block.extrabotany.twinstar.reference: Why is a raven like a writing desk?
block.extrabotany.blood_enchantress.refe: A bargain forged in blood and shadow
death.attack.extrabotany.excalibur: %1$s pierced by a beam from the Excalibur
death.attack.extrabotany.excalibur.playe: %1$s pierced by a beam from %2$s's Excalibur
death.attack.extrabotany.reverse_heal.pl: %1$s wounded seriously while trying to escape %2$s
death.attack.extrabotany.reverse_heal.it: %1$s wounded seriously while trying to escape %2$s's %3$s
death.attack.extrabotany.backfire: %1$s was killed by Honkai Energy's backlash
death.attack.extrabotany.backfire.player: %1$s was killed by Honkai Energy backlash while trying to escape %2$s
death.attack.extrabotany.backfire.item: %1$s was killed by Honkai Energy backlash while trying to escape %2$s's %3$s
item.extrabotany.music_disc_gaia3.desc: いけないボーダーライン
message.extrabotany.chat.bad_struct: No matter how hard you try to push %1$s into the beacon, nothing seems to happen. Perhaps your ritual structure is incorrect.
message.extrabotany.chat.unsafe_inventor: No matter how hard you call the guardian, there is no response. Perhaps it’s a good idea for those around to carry only vanilla or botania related items.
tooltip.extrabotany.excalibur: King's Blade Guides, As Fate Decides
extrabotany.armorset.starry_idol.name: Starry Idol
extrabotany.armorset.shadow_warrior.name: Shadow Warrior
extrabotany.armorset.goblin_slayer.name: Goblin Slayer
extrabotany.patchouli.template.pedestal_: Tip: Right click the pedestal with hammer to smash item
extrabotany.patchouli.template.eat.tip: Tip: Hold item in hand, then eat
extrabotany.page.zadkiel0: By mix the ice and $(item)Totem of Undying$() with $(thing)Mana$(), you create a $(item)Zadkiel$() that can control ice.$(br2)By holding this, water will frozen and slowdown your enemy.$(br2)Taking some $(thing)Manas$(), it can also make ice pierce your enemy.
extrabotany.page.zadkiel1: P... Please don't touch my head!
extrabotany.page.mana_reader0: $(7)Oops, Looks like you found the page that was stolen by Doge.$()$(br2)Count how many $(thing)Manas$() in $(item)Mana Pool$() always a annoying things, thanks for $(item)Mana Reader$(), Use it on $(item)Mana Pool$() or $(item)Mana Spreader$(), even some $(thing)Generating Flora$(), can show how many $(thing)Manas$() in it.
extrabotany.page.mana_reader2: $(item)Mana Reader$() can be combined with the $(item)Forest Wand$() or $(item)Elven Forest Wand$() in $(thing)Crafting Table$() to gain additional functionality.$(br2)A $(item)Forest Wand$() with this functionality will display a block’s $(thing)Current Mana$() and $(thing)Maximum Mana$() at the bottom of the $(thing)Mana Bar$() when pointing at blocks like the $(item)Mana Pool$().
extrabotany.page.mana_ring_master0: Feel like the $(item)Band of Mana$() or $(item)Greater Band of Mana$() is still not enough?$(br2)Here is the $(item)Master Band of Mana$(), specially designed for those suffering from mana deficiency anxiety — with a $(t: Long.MAX_VALUE)nearly$() $(9)I$(a)n$(b)f$(9)i$(d)n$(c)i$(e)t$(6)y$() mana storge.
extrabotany.page.pedestals0: Besides you can craft a $(item)Petal Apothecary$() with $(item)Livingrock$(), you can also craft a $(thing)Nature Pedestal$().$(br2)Use to put item on the pedestal.
extrabotany.page.pedestals2: Item on the pedestal can use $()Hammer$() to $(thing)Smash$().$(br2)After several times of $(thing)Smash$(), it will transform into another item and drop some experience.
extrabotany.page.pedestals4: For automation, you can place a $(item)Item Frame$() on the side, then insert a $(thing)Hammer$() into the frame.$(br2)Pedestal will auto craft with $(thing)Hammers$() in the frame.
extrabotany.page.pedestals5: My body is small, My mind still sharp
extrabotany.page.hammers0: Use $(item)Manasteel$(), $(item)Elementium$(), or $(item)Terrasteel$() to craft a $(thing)Hammer$()!$(br2)It can not only $(thing)Smash$() item on $(thing)Nature Pedestal$(), but also a $(thing)Pickaxe$().$(br2)And possessing the damage of an $(thing)Axe$().
extrabotany.page.hammers2: Like $(item)Elementium Pickaxe$(), $(item)Elementium Hammer$() will clear away $(item)Cobblestone$(0), $(item)Dirt$(0), $(item)Netherrack$(0), and other common materials, leaving behind only ores and fine resources.$(br2)When sneaking, it will normally drop.
extrabotany.page.hammers4: $(item)Terra Smasher$() is your best friends when mining.$(br2)Like $(item)Terra Shatterer$(), it can break massive blocks when it is active.
extrabotany.page.hammers6: $(item)Gaia Hammer$() like the $(item)Mace$().$(br2)Falling from a height while holding it and striking an enemy triggers a powered $(thing)Smash$(), propelling the user back into the air due to recoil.$(br2)Note: the fall distance does not affect the damage dealt.
extrabotany.page.hammers8: $(thing)Light$() is the $(item)Photonium Hammer$()'s favorite things. Holding it stand under the sky light, you will have $(thing)Speed$() effect.$(br2)Note: Not effective in $(thing)Cave$().
extrabotany.page.hammers10: $(thing)Dark$() is the $(item)Shadowium Hammer$()'s favorite things. Holding it when night, you will have $(thing)Night Vision$() effect.$(br2)Note: Also effective in $(thing)Cave$().
extrabotany.page.hammers12: $(item)Aerialite Hammer$()'s motto is the Freedom. Just a little $(item)Mana$() cost, you will have $(thing)Haste$() effect.$(br2)Note: It can't break massive blocks.
extrabotany.page.hammers14: The hammer made of $(item)Orichalcos$()is no joke, it's the upgrade of $(item)Terra Smasher$(), Bigger, Better, Stronger!$(br2)Not only $(thing)Fireproof$(), but also $(thing)Blast-Resistant$()
extrabotany.page.hammers16: $(item)Das Rheingold$()? Are you crazy?...Well, the $(item)Rhein Hammer$() comes with $(thing)Haste$(), $(thing)Speed$(), $(thing)Night Vision$(), and $(thing)Fire Resistance$(), it’s practically born for mining.
extrabotany.page.hammers17: Everything relies on heavy $(thing)Mana$() consumption, once the $(thing)Mana$() supply is cut off, this hammer will instantly become unable to even mine $(thing)a single block$().$(br2)To use it, make sure you have enough $(thing)Mana$(), and $(k:sneak)+$(k:use) to switch the tool into its $(thing)active$() mode.
extrabotany.page.fuels0: An advanced fuel obtained by infusing $(item)Coal$() with $(thing)Mana$(), capable of burning in a $(item)Furnace$() for several times longer than regular $(item)Coal$().
extrabotany.page.fuels2: Eating $(item)Nightmare Fuel$() is generally a bad idea, it inflicts temporary $(thing)negative potion effects$() and forcibly drains some of your $(thing)health$().$(br2)However, as your mind synchronizes with the $(item)Nightmare Fuel$() during the process, a strange reaction occurs, resulting in the creation of a new kind of fuel: $(item)Spirit Fuel$().
extrabotany.page.fuels4: In contrast to $(item)Nightmare Fuel$(), eat $(item)Spirit Fuel$() grants you temporary $(thing)positive potion effects$(), and it burns for several times longer in a $(item)Furnace$() than $(item)Nightmare Fuel$().
extrabotany.page.camera0: Has the ability to Thoughtography.$(br2)Consumes some $(thing)Mana$() on use to mark all enemies within the viewfinder, and clears all non-friendly projectiles in the area.
extrabotany.page.camera1: Enemies marked by the camera are afflicted with the $(thing)Link$() effect.$(br2)When an entity with $(thing)Link$() takes damage, all other nearby entities that also have the $(thing)Link$() effect will receive a portion of the same damage.
extrabotany.page.failnaught0: By consuming a large amount of $(thing)Mana$(), the $(item)Failnaught$() can fire a powerful arrow made of $(thing)Mana$().$(br2)This arrow not only pierces through enemies but also deals heavy damage to all $(thing)entities$() along its path. The longer you charge it, the greater its damage and range.
extrabotany.page.failnaught2: $(item)Failnaught$() can be $(thing)enchanted$() with various $(thing)enchantments$(), providing the following bonuses:$(br2)$(thing)Power$(): Increases base damage by 0.5 and consumes additional $(thing)Mana$() per level, adding 0.5 base damage each level.$(br2)$(thing)Multishot$(): Fires three $(thing)Mana Arrows$() simultaneously, consuming triple the $(thing)Mana$().$(br2)$(thing)Quick Charge$(): Consumes $(thing)Mana$() to speed up draw time.
extrabotany.page.failnaught3: $(thing)Punch$(): Consumes $(thing)Mana$() to increase knockback distance on hit.$(br2)$(thing)Flame$(): Consumes $(thing)Mana$() to set hit enemies ablaze.
extrabotany.page.excalibur0: It's time to upgrade your $(item)Terra Blade$(). Here comes the superior $(item)Excalibur$().$(br2)Compared to the $(item)Terra Blade$(), it fires golden $(thing)Mana burst$() on attack that track and strike your enemies, dealing $(thing)bypass armor$() damage.
extrabotany.page.jingwei0: The power of the Jingwei is bound to it, granting the wearer great strength.$(br2)When equipped with the $(item)Feather of Jingwei$(), each $(thing)unarmed$() attack releases an $(thing)Aura Fire$()—a punch wave that damages enemies.$(br2)When the $(thing)Aura Fire$() deals damage, it also grants the wearer a small amount of $(thing)damage absorption$().
extrabotany.page.magic_finger0: Out and about with plenty of $(thing)Mana$() on you, but no $(thing)Mana$() in your $(item)Mana Pool$()?  Luckily, there’s the $(item)Magic Finger$().$(br2)Sneak and use the $(item)Magic Finger$() on the $(item)Mana Pool$() to transfer 10,000 $(thing)Mana$() from yourself into the pool.$(br2)Due to the interaction between $(thing)Mana$(), entities hit by this item will suffer $(thing)Heal Reverse$() for the next 3 seconds.
extrabotany.page.walking_cane0: The $(item)Walking Cane$() is a handy tool — just holding it increases your $(thing)movement speed$().$(br2)Hold use to charge it up, it will launch you forward in a quick $(thing)dash$(), perfect for fast travel.
extrabotany.page.core_of_the_void0: $(7)Honkai is an abnormal disaster, a rhythm of the universe's periodic adjustment.$(br2)——Otto Apocalypse$()$(br2)The core of the $(thing)Herrscher of The Void$() contains powerful Honkai Energy.
extrabotany.page.core_of_the_void1:
When equipped $(item)Core of The Void$(), you will gain $(thing)Flight$() abality like Creative Mode, increase your $(thing)Movement Speed$() and $(thing)Flying Speed$(), also immunity to $(thing)Projectiles$() and $(thing)Negative Potion Effects$().
$(br2)But at what the cost? It is $(thing)BackFire$(). When $(thing)Mana$() was drawn up, it will drain your life. So make sure your cotains enough $(thing)Mana$().
extrabotany.page.gaia_3rd0: Time to challenge yourself! After mix $(item)Gaia Spirit$() and $(thing)YinYang$(), you made a ticket with black and white color.$(br2)This seemingly light and flimsy ticket can summon a stronger $(thing)Gaia Guardian$() than ever before.
extrabotany.page.gaia_3rd2: First, the area required to summon the $(thing)Guardian$() is larger than before. In addition, all players nearby must not carry any items except those from vanilla Minecraft, Botania, or this mod. Once the battle begins, any items outside these sources will be forcibly disarmed.
extrabotany.page.gaia_3rd3: During the battle, the $(thing)Guardian$() will also summon landmines of different colors:$(br2)$(li)$(1)Blue$(): Inflicts Blindness and Wither effects.$(li)$(4)Red$(): Deals true damage.$(li)$(a)Green$(): Disarms the item in your main hand.
extrabotany.page.gaia_3rd4: $(thing)Guardian$() will also summon even more powerful minions, who will stop at nothing to fight for it. Make sure to take them down first!
extrabotany.page.yin_and_yang0: Infuse $(item)Elementium Ingot$() with $(thing)Mana$(), and use $(item)Gilded Mashed Potato$() as a catalyst, can transmute it into a pair of brand-new twin metals from the Beyond.
extrabotany.page.yin_and_yang1: Tools made from $(item)Photonium Ingots$() favor the daylight, gaining extra bonuses during the day.$(br2)Items made from $(item)Shadowium Ingots$() favor the darkness, gaining extra bonuses at night.
extrabotany.page.pandoras_box0: A treasure box after you defect the $(thing)Gaia Guardian III$().$(br2)What happens when you open it?...God knows.
extrabotany.page.pandoras_box1: You felt your sins crawling on your back, finally you open it.$(br2)To your surprise, there’s no price to pay. Just some bunch of $(item)Reward bags$() and an $(item)Hero Medal$() in it.$(br2)It seems you have successfully conquered yourself.
extrabotany.page.reward_bags0: Gacha is a fantastic things, everyone loves gacha, especially the moment you get that golden legendary.$(br2)$(m)Not to mention this gacha doesn’t even cost a dime.$()
extrabotany.page.mana_charger0: Often forget your $(item)Terra Shatterer$() floating in the $(item)Mana Pool$()?$(br2)Now you can sleep peacefully.$(br2)Craft a $(item)Mana Charger$() and place it on top of the $(item)Mana Pool$(), then you can place your item on it.$(br2)Use $(item)Wand of the Forest$() to change input/output mode on $(item)Mana Pool$().
extrabotany.page.dimension_catalyst0: Just like the $(item)Alchemy Catalyst$() and $(item)Conjuration Catalyst$(), the $(item)Dimensional Catalyst$() can also placed at the bottom of the $(item)Mana Pool$().$(br2)It possesses the power to $(thing)transmute$() items from one dimension into another dimension.
extrabotany.page.quartzs0: There are so many beautiful decorative quartz, use them to spruce up your base!
extrabotany.page.trade_orchid0: $(item)Tradeorchid$() is villagers’s friend. It can use $(thing)mana$() to grant nearby villagers a discount on trades.$(br2)The discount effects from multiple $(item)Tradeorchids$() do not stack.$(br2)Any $(thing)Redstone Signal$() can suppression it's activity.
extrabotany.page.nature_orb0: $(item)Nature Orb$() can store $(thing)Nature Aura$(), harnessing the power of nature to protect its master. $(br2)It also grants blessings depend to the amount of $(thing)Nature Aura$() contained within.
extrabotany.page.nature_orb1: $(li)$(b)$(t: 100,000 Nature Aura)Blessing of Mana$(): Produce some mana.$(li)$(c)$(t: 300,000 Nature Aura)Blessing of Regeneration$()Speed up health regen.$(li)$(a)$(t: 400,000 Nature Aura)Blessing of Senro$()Clear Harmful Potions.$(br2)You can also use some $(t: 200,000Nature Aura)Nature Aura$() to Spawn $(thing)Gaia Guardian III$().
extrabotany.page.nature_orb3: To charge it, you need to build a $(thing)Nature Pedestal$() multiblock structure to gather $(thing)Nature Aura$().$(br2)The multiblock structure has two tiers, with the advanced tier providing higher efficiency in collecting $(thing)Nature Aura$().$(br2)The $(item)Mana Pool$() in the advanced structure, filled with $(thing)mana$(), can speed up the gathering of $(thing)Nature Aura$().
extrabotany.page.mana_cocktail0: After overworking, have a glass of $(item)Mana Cocktail$() to refresh your mind and never feel tired.$(br2)Use a $(item)Managlass Bottle$() use on a $(item)Mana Pool$()$(t: 25,000 mana) to fill a small cup.
extrabotany.page.mana_cocktail2: $(o)$(m)This product is not a substitute for medicine. Please ensure compliance with the laws and regulations of your country/region before use.$(br2)$(o)$(m)By agreeing to the user agreement: I confirm that Steve is of legal age.
extrabotany.page.mana_cocktail3: Of course, you can also use different kinds of $(thing)Flask$() to change its brew.
extrabotany.page.infinite_wine0: $(item)Infinite Wine$() is a special relic that can gradually refills the portion that has been consumed over time.$(br2)Crafting it requires $(item)Hero Medal$() and any full cup of $(thing)Cocktail$().
extrabotany.page.infinite_wine1: Its $(thing)effect level$() and $(thing)duration$() are both stronger than those of the original cocktail, and when it is $(thing)full$(), you can replace its effect by combining it with another $(thing)full$() cocktail.
extrabotany.page.holy_water_grenade0: $(item)Holy Water Grenade$() is more than a splash potion container. When it shatters, all positive effects inside are granted to the $(thing)user$(), while negative effects are applied to other entities nearby.$(br2)Crafting it also requires a full cup of any $(thing)cocktail$().
extrabotany.page.void_archives0: A relic discovered as a reward from the $(item)Pandora’s Box$(), can imitate this relics when has enough $(thing)mana$():$(li)The Fruit of Grisaia$(li)Infinite Wine$(li)Excalibur$(li)Failnaught$(li)Shameimaru's Camera$(br2)$(k:sneak)+$(k:use) to switch variants.
extrabotany.page.herrscher0: Once upon a time, there was a glorious pre-civilization on this land, and they created the theoretical foundation of all natural magic today. $(br2)However, one day, $(thing)Honkai$() came. $(br2)Honkai created monsters, and also created a powerful creature derived —— Herrscher.
extrabotany.page.glided_potato0: Like $(item)Glistering Melon Slice$(), $(item)Golden Carrot$(), you can also gilded on $(item)Potato$().$(br2)While it's not edible, it's an excellent crafting material — especially after being smashed into $(item)Gilded Mashed Potato$().
extrabotany.page.universe_medium0: $(o)$(7)The universe has a beginning, but no end—infinite. $(br2)Although the planets have their origins, they are destroyed by their own power—finite. $(br2)The wise are often the most foolish, as we can see from history. $(br2)This can be said to be the ultimatum from God to those who resist.
extrabotany.page.universe_medium1: $(o)$(7)To those who come after me: $(br2)Everything is just a coincidence, but that coincidence is also the will of the world that was determined from the beginning. $(br2)I am not crazy, I am very normal, I am just telling the truth here, not some chuunibyou fantasy. $(br2)Good luck to you. $(br2)El Psy Congroo.
extrabotany.page.orichalcos0: A high-grade alloy forged with immense amounts of $(thing)Mana$() and the soul force of $(item)Gaia Spirit$().$(br2)It is not only fireproof, but also highly stable and explosion-resistant.
extrabotany.page.aerialite0: Sky isn't the limit, because of the $(item)Aerialite$(). $(br2)Items made from aerialite are exceptionally lightweight, making them easy to wield and handle. Their durability rivals even that of $(item)Terrasteel$(), making it a truly outstanding crafting material.
extrabotany.page.das_rheingold0: It is said that this mighty golden relic contains the power of the Primordial Mana Source and Supreme Soulforce, allowing it to surpass even the $(thing)Relics of the Gods$() — and go beyond their limits.
extrabotany.page.das_rheingold1: Relics crafted with the $(item)Das Rheingold$() will $(thing)Unbound$() until they are $(thing)placed in a player's inventory$() again.$(br2)Use the $(item)Das Rheingold$() on a player to $(thing)Bind$() their soul to it — any relics crafted with it will be $(thing)Bound$() to that player.$(br2)$(thing)$(k:sneak)$() + $(thing)$(k:use)$() to clear the current soulbinding.
extrabotany.page.starry_idol0: From the Isekai beyond this world, a princess who reigns as the greatest of all. She once wore this armor set.$(br2)When equip the full armor set, grants an $(t:60％ discount)$(thing)Super Mana Affinity$().
extrabotany.page.starry_idol5: $(br2)$(br2)$(br2)$(7)Wear it, and poof! You’re Miku~$(br2)I know you’re glad to do~
extrabotany.page.pleiades_combat_maid0: Rumored to be the battle uniform that worn by the Pleiades Combat Maids in Isekai "Yggdrasil".$(br2)When equip the full armor set, will increase the damage cursed by $(thing)Empty Handed$(), and increase $(t:30％ discount)$(thing)Mana Affinity$() and $(thing)Regeneration Ability$().
extrabotany.page.pleiades_combat_maid5: Rumor has it that the $(item)Pleiades Combat Maid Suit$() is extremely $(thing)Bloodthirsty$(). But no matter how closely you examine it, nothing seems out of the ordinary.$(br2)Perhaps it craves a fierce, all-out battle—one drenched in blood to awaken its true nature.
extrabotany.page.pleiades_combat_maid6: The rumors were true. After you covered the suit with blood, it transformed into a truly $(thing)Bloodthirsty$() suit.$(br2)While wearing it, each attack $(thing)drains$() a portion of the enemy’s blood and $(thing)powers$() you in return.
extrabotany.page.pleiades_combat_maid8: $(br2)$(br)$(7)Many times someone will make a doubt about the very set, why a maid outfit is a bloody tool.$(br2)No one can figure out what the owner of this set has gone through.$(br2)No one knows why this set is stained with blood......
extrabotany.page.shadow_warrior0: The armor set made from $(item)Shadowium$(), grant $(thing)Night Vision$() effect when night.$(br2)When equip the full armor set, will immune $(thing)Falling Damage$() and $(thing)Explosion Damage$().$(br2)Has a little chance to spawn $(thing)Dark Pixie$() when took damage.
extrabotany.page.goblin_slayer0: The armor set made from $(item)Photonium$(), grant $(thing)Speed$() effect when daytime.$(br2)When equip the full armor set, will made $(t:50％)extra damage$() for $(thing)Undead$() Mob. $(br2)For $(thing)Goblins$(), can kill with one attack.
extrabotany.page.woodienia0: Logging is $(item)Woodienia$()'s job, just need a little bit of $(thing)Mana$(), It can help you harvest the $(thing)Logs$() within a certain range.$(br2)It loves chopping trees too much, often can't tell friend from foe. Built your cabin near the $(item)Woodienia$() might not a good idea.$(br2)Any $(thing)Redstone Signal$() can suppression it's activity.
extrabotany.page.reikarlily0: $(item)Reikarlily$() turns the tremendous energy of $(thing)lightning$() into $(thing)Mana$(). When a $(thing)lightning bolt$() hits nearby, it will generate a great amount of $(thing)Mana$() immediately and continue to produce $(thing)Mana$() for a long time.
extrabotany.page.reikarlily1: Sometimes you thought: Maybe it has too many $(thing)lightning bolt$() hits on it when $(thing)raining$(). Is it really protecting you when raining? Or else it's actually $(thing)attracted$() all those $(thing)lightning bolt$()? Nobody knows.
extrabotany.page.bellflower0: $(item)Bellflower$() converts wind power into $(thing)Mana$().$(br2)When there's $(thing)Enough Space$() nearby, it slowly generates a bit of $(thing)Mana$() and the wind blew away one of its leaves.$(br2)Over time, it will eventually decay into a $(item)Dead Bush$().
extrabotany.page.bellflower1: Planting the $(item)Bellflower$() high in the sky allows it to harness stronger winds, but be careful not to reach the calm $(thing)Stratosphere$().$(br2)Focus on the $(item)Bellflower$() with a $(item)Wand of the Forest$() to view the current $(thing)Wind Power$() it receives.
extrabotany.page.bellflower2: Only a storm can fell Greatwood
extrabotany.page.annoyingflower0: The $(item)Annoyingflower$() can fish in nearby $(thing)Nature Pedestal$() filled with $(item)Water Bucket$(). For that process it will use $(thing)mana$(). Feeding $(item)Fried Chicken$() to it will significantly increase the efficiency and the chance of getting treasure.
extrabotany.page.fried_chicken0: $(item)Fried Chicken$() is a delicious food that can be eaten even when you're $(thing)full$().
extrabotany.page.fried_chicken1: The caged bird I forgot, its beloved name is "charActer."
extrabotany.page.more_brews0: Now you can make more brews in $(item)Brewery$(), here are their effects and recipes.
extrabotany.page.more_brews1a: A simple brew, mimicking a $(item)Potion of Haste$(0) and boosted. When quaffed, it gives its drinker a $(thing)Haste III$(0) effect.
extrabotany.page.more_brews2a: A simple brew, mimicking a $(item)Potion of Turtle Master$(0). When quaffed, it gives its drinker both $(thing)Resistance III$(0) and $(thing)Slowness III$(0) effect.
extrabotany.page.more_brews3a: A brew that can gives almost all beneficial to drinker. If it has any downside, probably is the very short duration and all effects are only level I.
extrabotany.page.more_brews3b: One is all and all is one.
extrabotany.page.more_brews4a: A brew that can gives drinker both beneficial and harmful effects, one side makes you powerful, on the other side may drained your life.
extrabotany.page.more_brews4b: I Will... Set the Seas Ablaze!
extrabotany.page.more_brews5a: A simple brew, mimicking a $(item)Potion of Levitation$(0). When quaffed, it gives its drinker a $(thing)Levitation III$(0) effect.
extrabotany.page.stonesia0: Place $(item)Stonesia$() near your mine or cobblestone generator! It will eat these Stone or Ore $(thing)blocks$() to produce a certain amount of $(thing)mana$().
extrabotany.page.edelweiss0: Many people have thought about digging a handful of white snow in winter to taste, but $(item)Edelweiss$() was thinking: "How to take a bite out of the Snow Golem."$(br2)While working, $(item)Edelweiss$() will eat $(thing)Snow Golem$() within range to generate $(thing)mana$().
extrabotany.page.edelweiss1: It's the season of White Album again...
extrabotany.page.resoncund0: Sounds comes from the resonance of $(thing)mana$(). $(item)Resoncund$() can reverse this process and produce a certain amount of $(thing)mana$().$(br2)But too many of the same sounds will cause $(item)Resoncund$() to go on strike against this sound unless it is allowed to rest for a while.
extrabotany.page.frost_ring0: Wearing a $(item)Frost Ring$() allows you to freeze surrounding $(thing)Water$() and solidify surrounding $(thing)Lava$() without a $(thing)Frost Walker$().$(br2)Looking at mobs will also slow them down slightly.
extrabotany.page.frost_ring1: I am the Frozen Heart of Scourge
extrabotany.page.dispersive_ring0: $(item)Dispersive Ring$() can export the $(thing)mana$() from your $(item)Mana Tablet$(), $(item)Mana Ring$() or other mana storage items, and supply it to nearby $(thing)Functional Flowers$() for use.
extrabotany.page.curse_ring0: With the power of $(item)Wither Skeleton Skull$(), $(item)Cursed Ring$() can consume a small amount of $(thing)Mana$() to make entities in a small area gain $(thing)Wither$() and $(thing)Bad Luck$() effects.
extrabotany.page.pure_daisy_pendant0: $(item)Pure Daisy Pendant$() gives the wearer abilities similar to the $(item)Pure Daisy$(). $(thing)Right Click$() a block using empty hand and consuming a small amount of $(thing)mana$(), it can turn $(item)Logs$() into $(item)Livingwood Logs$(), $(item)Stones$() into $(item)Livingrocks$(), and so on...
extrabotany.page.spider_ring0: $(item)Spider Ring$() allows the wearer to have the ability to $(thing)climbing the walls$() like a $(thing)Spider$(), without the need for $(item)Ladders$().
extrabotany.page.spider_ring1: With great power comes great responsibility
extrabotany.page.jackie_chan_ring0: When equipped the $(item)Jackie Chan Ring$(), wearer can jump along the wall.
extrabotany.page.parkour_ring0: Combining the advantages of $(item)Spider Ring$() and $(item)Jackie Chan Ring$(), this is $(item)Parkour Ring$(). $(br2)Immune to fall damage while wearing it.
extrabotany.page.sunshine_lily0: $(item)Sunshine Lily$() have the same ability as $(item)Daybloom$(), converting sunlight into $(thing)mana$(). $(br2)Like $(item)Hydroangeas$(), they will decay after about three days.
extrabotany.page.sunshine_lily1: There's a flower on your lawn
extrabotany.page.moonlight_lily0: $(item)Moonlight Lily$() has the same ability as $(item)Nightshade$(), generating $(thing)mana$(0) at night. $(br2)Like $(item)Hydroangeas$(), they will decay after about three days.
extrabotany.page.serenitian0: $(item)Serenitian$(0) could prevent passive flowers nearby at the same floor from decay, and set the decay progress to zero.
extrabotany.page.twinstar0: $(item)Twinstar$()like a thermoelectric generator, If you pour lava in one block and water in one block around it, it will start producing $(thing)mana$().$(br2)The greater the $(thing)temperature difference$() of the surrounding liquid, the faster the $(thing)mana$() is produced.$(br2)Time goes by, the temperature difference will cause it decay and turn into a $(item)Dead Bush$().
extrabotany.page.omniviolet0: Knowledge is power, $(item)Omniviolet$() converts Books or Written Books into $(thing)Mana$(0).$(br2)Placing $(item)Bookshelves$() around it can increase its mana production efficiency.
extrabotany.page.tinkle0: $(item)Tinkle$() converts kinetic energy of nearby moving players into $(thing)Mana$(). It will also increase players' energy consumption.
extrabotany.page.tinkle1: Ding dong, here I come to find you.
extrabotany.page.blood_enchantress0: $(item)Blood Enchantress$() creates $(thing)Mana$() by consuming nearby entity's life.$(br2)Each time it consumes, this entity is marked. Marks reduce its mana generation, and it will stop working when the total number of marks on nearby creatures exceeds a certain threshold.
extrabotany.page.mirrowtunia0: $(item)Mirrowtunia$() can continuously provide $(thing)Thirror$() effect to surrounding players like a beacon.$(br2)Players with the $(thing)Thirror$() effect can return some of the damage they take to the entity who caused it, just like the $(thing)Thorns$() enchantment.
extrabotany.page.necrofleur0: The creed of the $(item)Necrofleur$() is to harvest life. It damages entities whose health falls below a certain percentage of their maximum health, let them in $(thing)heal reverse$() for the next few seconds.
extrabotany.page.necrofleur2: $(item)Necrofleur$() can also be made into $(item)Necrofleur Petite$(), in which case its attack range and damage are reduced.
extrabotany.page.manalink0: $(item)Manalink$() can easily transfer $(thing)mana$() to a bound $(item)Mana Pool$() over a long distance.$(br2)To use $(item)Manalink$(), you must first use $(item)Block of Quartz$(), $(item)Obsidian$(), and $(item)Block of Lapis Lazuli$() to build a multi-block structure as shown in the right picture. The grass on the bottom cannot be replaced with $(item)Enchanted Soil$().
extrabotany.page.manalink1: After building the $(item)Manalink$() multi-block structure, you can start binding the $(item)Manalink$() to the $(item)Mana Pool$() which you want to remotely transfer.$(br2)Use the $(thing)Binding Mode$() of the $(item)Wand of the Forest$() and $(k:sneak)+$()$(k:use) to record the $(item)Mana Pool$(). When you see the prompt $(a)Selected...$(), then $(k:sneak)+$()$(k:use) the $(item)Manalink$() to be bound to establish a link.
extrabotany.page.enchanter0: By consuming a large amount of $(thing)mana$() and a long conversion time, $(item)Enchanter$() can convert the $(item)Grass Block$() into $(item)Enchanted Soil$().$(br2)Transformation process will continuously absorb $(thing)mana$(), and can be observed through $(item)Wand of the Forest$().
extrabotany.page.enchanter1: Knowledge is power and I know a lot
extrabotany.page.shields0: $(item)Manasteel$() can be inlaid on $(item)Shield$() to improve its properties, and can also consume $(thing)mana$() to self repair when damaged.
extrabotany.page.shields2: A shield inlaid with $(item)Elementium$() has higher durability, and will $(thing)Ignite$() the attacker after a successful block, and has a chance to summon $(thing)Pixie$() to counterattack.
extrabotany.page.shields4: A shield inlaid with $(item)Terrasteel$() will return some of the blocked damage to the attacker, and also provide $(thing)Regeneration$() effect to the defender.
extrabotany.page.achille_shield0: $(item)Achille Shield$() can block the erosion from $(thing)Honkai Energy$(). Also can return $(thing)All$() the blocked damage to the enemy.$(br2)Each attack with the $(item)Achille Shield$() increases the $(thing)Absorption$().$(br2)When the $(thing)Absorption$() exceeds half its maximum, press $(k:sneak)+$()$(k:use)$() to activate it's $(thing)Release Mode$().
extrabotany.page.achille_shield1: On the $(thing)Release Mode$(), the $(item)Achille Shield$() can be used as a $(thing)Sword$().$(br2)After $(thing)Absorption$() exhausted, it will return to its original mode.
extrabotany.page.achille_shield2: The Rising of the Shield Hero
extrabotany.page.records0: Sometimes, after the $(thing)Guardian of Gaia$() dies, it will drop a $(item)record$() made up of its remaining consciousness, recording the melody of your battle with it.
extrabotany.page.records1: A rare drop from $(thing)Guardian of Gaia III$(), recording the melody of fighting him.
extrabotany.page.more_lens0: You can now craft more practical $(item)Mana Lens$(). Here are their recipes and effects:$(br2)$(item)Push Lens$() causes the $(thing)Mana Burst$() to push all mobs it touches, forcing them to move with the $(thing)Mana Burst$().
extrabotany.page.more_lens2: $(item)Smelt Lens$() will destroy blocks collided by the $(thing)Mana Burst$() and drop the smelted items.
extrabotany.page.more_lens4: $(item)Mana Lens$() is like a $(item)Mana Pool$(), it will infuse the item with $(thing)mana$(). If you place a $(item)Alchemy Catalyst$() or a $(item)Conjuration Catalyst$() under the item, it will do the corresponding work.
extrabotany.page.more_lens6: $(item)Potion Lens$() will add potion effects to the first entity collided. Craft the lens with the brew flask to decide its effect.
extrabotany.page.more_lens8: $(item)Trace Lens$() causes $(thing)Mana Burst$() to lock onto nearby mobs and continue tracking them until one of them disappears.
